## Table.Builder.updateCells() method

Update cells, and resync slots Cells are assumed to keep the same anchors, width, height and kind (header/data), hence columnHasData and rowHasData don't change but slots need to be updated to the new version of their cell.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updateCells({ cells, downwardGrowingCells, }: {
            cells?: Iterable<Cell.Builder>;
            downwardGrowingCells?: Iterable<Cell.Builder>;
        }): Builder;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { cells, downwardGrowingCells, } | { cells?: Iterable&lt;[Cell.Builder](./alfa-table.cell.builder.md)<!-- -->&gt;; downwardGrowingCells?: Iterable&lt;[Cell.Builder](./alfa-table.cell.builder.md)<!-- -->&gt;; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Builder](./alfa-table.table.builder.md)
